mapper.sql: rowid, COMPANY_CODE, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, CHECK_POINT_TOTAL, COMMUTE_SETTIME, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS, PRO_NO, CHECKIN_EX_MINITES, CHECKOUT_EX_MINITES
mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.pro_name from cp_commute_config t1 left join pm_base t2 on t1.pro_no=t2.pro_no where t1.rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into cp_commute_config (COMPANY_CODE, PRO_NO, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, CHECK_POINT_TOTAL, COMMUTE_SETTIME, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS, CHECKIN_EX_MINITES, CHECKOUT_EX_MINITES, UNIT_CODE) values (#{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkinTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkPointTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkinExMinites,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkoutExMinites,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 9)
mapper.update:
update cp_commute_config
CHECKIN_TIME = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKOUT_TIME = #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKIN_EX_MINITES = #{checkinExMinites,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKOUT_EX_MINITES = #{checkoutExMinites,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECK_POINT_TOTAL = #{checkPointTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMUTE_SETTIME = now(),
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = now(),
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cp_commute_config set COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKIN_TIME = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKOUT_TIME = #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_POINT_TOTAL = #{checkPointTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMUTE_SETTIME = #{commuteSettime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
